using namespace std;
 
template <class T> T min3(T a, T b, T c){ return min(a, min(b, c));};
template <class T> T max3(T a, T b, T c){ return max(a, max(b, c));};
 
typedef long long int64;
typedef unsigned long long qword;
typedef long double ldouble;
 
void openFile(){freopen("/home/khaihanhdk/devplace/a.inp", "r", stdin);}
 
int res[10100], rr[10100];
char s[10100];
 
int main()
{
    //openFile();
    int oo;
    scanf("%d", &oo);
    for(int o = 0; o < oo; o++)
    {
        scanf("%s", &s);
        res[0] = 0;
        rr[0] = 0;
        int ra = -1000000000;
        int ss = 0;
        int len = strlen(s);
        for(int i = 0; i < len; i++)
        {
            if(s[i] == '1'){
                res[i + 1] = res[i] - 1;ss++;}
            else res[i + 1] = res[i] + 1;
            rr[i + 1] = min(rr[i], res[i + 1]);
            ra = max(ra, res[i + 1] - rr[i]);
        }
        printf("%d\n", ss + ra);
    }
}
